text: Tucked behind the gates of exclusive Bradbury Oaks Estates, this stunning sanctuary offers unparalleled privacy, elegance, and breathtaking 360-degree canyon & city light views. Situated on over two acres of beautifully landscaped grounds, the property features majestic oak trees, fruit trees, and terraced back gardens. A private road and gated driveway leads to an expansive Chateau that was reimagined in 1995, with grand cut-stone and stucco faade, where an octagonal entry with leaded glass sidelights and transom sets a sophisticated tone. A picturesque stone bridge over a koi pond with wrought iron and river rock accents welcomes you home. Inside, the elegant formal foyer showcases inlaid marble flooring, custom stenciling, and arched doorways. The step-down formal living room features a corner fireplace, wall sconces, carpeting, and French doors leading to the backyard. The intimate family room offers beamed ceilings, a grey brick fireplace, cherry wood flooring, and an octagonal window. The French Normandy style gourmet kitchen is a chefs delight, complete with a center island with prep sink, granite countertops, stone tile flooring, ample custom wood cabinetry, a built-in Sub-Zero refrigerator, a six-burner Russell Range cooktop with hood, built-in oven and microwave, and an attached breakfast room. The octagonal formal dining room exudes elegance with marble flooring and black inlay. The west wing includes a spacious bedroom/office with built-in workspace with mirrored closet doors, a hallway bath with a jetted tub & ample linen storage, as well as a luxurious primary suite featuring a built-in dresser, wet bar, walk-in closet, a fireplace, and a spa-like bath with dual sinks, a jetted tub, and separate shower. The east wing offers another well-appointed bedroom, a bathroom with jetted tub and brass fixtures, and access to the attached 2-car garage with a rear pass-through door. The expansive backyard is an entertainers dream, boasting a large swimming pool with diving board, an outdoor kitchen & BBQ area, an inviting stone patio, brick-accented sidewalks, and a charming tree swing. A gated circular driveway offers ample parking. Additional highlights include an underground wine cellar, separate laundry room, concrete tile lifetime roof, central air & heat, recessed lighting, central vacuum, custom window coverings, and water softening system. This exceptional estate blends luxury, comfort, and natural beauty in a prestigious setting!

Beautiful Property Located in Prestigious Gated Bradbury Estates. 2 Bedroom 2 Bath 1, 550 Sq Ft Home with Open Beam Ceilings, Large fireplace in living room. Large Country Kitchen with Granite Counter tops. Central Air. Bonus room separate from house. Large Carport. Huge 144, 766 Sq Ft (3.3) (A) Lot. Amazing opportunity to own property in one of the most sought after Communities in southern California. Close to Pasadena, San Marino, Glendale, Burbank.

Surrounded by lush landscape and tucked away from the street, this private Bradbury estate exudes pride of ownership. Upon entering the home, you are met with breathtaking views of the stunning grounds beyond. Picturesque windows throughout the home allow natural light to pour in from the exterior. To one side of the foyer is the elegant living room with wainscoting, fireplace with mantel and marble hearth. French doors divide the room from the main entryway for extra privacy. The large formal dining room is perfect for entertaining even the most sophisticated of guests. Off of the kitchen is another comfortable and glorious eating area with 180-degree views of the canyon. The majestic fireplace in the family room is the focal point of this spectacular space. On either side of the stone fireplace are stained glass windows. The 2 skylights in the vaulted wood ceiling allows for extra light to enter the room. Windows align two sides of the room providing a magnificent view of the park-like grounds. The primary suite has an enormous bay window seat, perfect for reading or simply enjoying the awe-inspiring views. The ensuite bathroom offers a large shower and a separate soaking tub. The closet is an unusually large room that holds, not only clothing, but furniture, as well. The study with a spacious loft, can be accessed from the primary suite and the family room. The expansive grounds, with an abundance of fruit trees, (peach, plum, orange, apricot, fig, loquat and lemon), have a number of outdoor sitting areas perfect for entertaining and enjoying the breathtaking sunset views. In a separate area, and surrounded by a well-manicured lawn and mature landscaping, is the large pool and spa. This incredible home has 4-bedrooms and 41/2 bathrooms, an extra-large 2-car garage, dual HVAC, Solar Panels (owned), and a large attic space, perfect for storage. Situated in the quiet foothills, yet close to shops and restaurants, this property is conveniently located near the 210, 605 and 57 freeways. It is also within close proximity to the prestigious Duarte Performing Arts Center and minutes from Old Town Monrovia.

Situated in the prestigious Bradbury neighborhood, this 4-bed, 3-bath home exudes 1960s charm in over 3, 400 SF of living space. The versatile layout allows for a seamless flow between the living room, eat-in kitchen, formal dining room, and family room. As you enter the large bonus room you'll be swept back in time to the Swinging Sixties - mix up an old fashioned at the wet bar and entertain guests in this spacious room with wood-beamed ceilings & skylights and impressive glass walls overlooking the backyard. This is truly an ideal space for gathering with loved ones and creating memories. The bedrooms are large and include a primary suite with a charming bench-seated bay window and ensuite bath. This well-maintained home presents an exciting opportunity for those with a vision to update and transform it into a modern masterpiece. The 20, 067 SF lot includes a pool & spa, covered patio, and plenty of room to garden or play and the surrounding neighborhood offers a peaceful and serene setting, with stunning views of the San Gabriel Mountains and a picturesque landscape. Close to local parks, hiking trails, & recreational amenities, there are endless opportunities for outdoor activities nearby. Conveniently located near major transportation routes, this home offers easy access to the bustling city centers of Los Angeles and Pasadena, ensuring that you're never too far from the vibrant urban lifestyle. Don't miss this chance to unleash the full potential this home has to offer!

Located on an expansive 16, 924 SF lot with stunning views of the surrounding mountains and valley below, this charming 3-bed 2-bath home is brimming with character & untapped potential. Step inside and discover the timeless appeal of this 2, 804 SF classic residence. Intricate wood details abound from the crown molding & wood framed windows to the doors, cabinetry & built-ins throughout. The flooring features a mix of hardwood, oak, and tongue & groove and the attention to detail in the craftsmanship of the home, including toenailed construction, highlights the enduring quality of this property. The living room and primary bedroom both feature cozy fireplaces & elegant bay windows that frame breathtaking views of the surrounding landscape. The formal dining room leads into the spacious kitchen, boasting an abundance of cabinet space, walk-in pantry & charming breakfast nook, overlooking the family room - a great place to relax and unwind after a long day. The office features two stunning walls of built-in shelves and twin built-in desks - perfect for working from home or studying for a big test. The bedrooms are large and the bathrooms are thoughtfully designed with dual sinks and separate shower & tub spaces. There is a convenient laundry room inside, the 2-car garage offers parking & storage space, & the yard is an untouched gem ready to be transformed. Don't miss this chance to own a piece of Bradbury's charm and create a truly unique living experience in a prime location.

Discover the allure of this 2024 Turnkey Extraordinary Estate, nestled in one of Bradburys most cherished neighborhoods. Encompassing 53, 958 SF (1.238 acres), this gated property features a luxurious 2story home thoughtfully designed for family living and entertaining. The Wide Circular Driveway leads to a double-door 4-car Garage with a 12-foot ceiling clearance perfectly accommodating RV/Boat parking. This South-facing home is filled with natural sunlight spanning 4, 353 SF of luxurious spaces, drawing you in with its inviting features. As you step through the High-ceiling Foyer, you enter a Grand Living Room featuring a striking Fireplace & entertainment center. The Living Room is opened to 16-foot expansive Fleetwood Double-glass Sliding Pocket Doors. When these doors are opened, they create a seamless connection between the indoor and outdoor spaces, providing an unmatched sense of luxury and tranquility. Adjacent to the Grand Living Room, a stylishly designed Game Room. The Kitchen and Breakfast Nook Area boasts stunning views of the Sparkling Pool through Double-glass French Doors. This Kitchen is a chefs dream, featuring Viking stainless steel appliance, custom-built natural wood cabinetry, and a waterfall-style Quartzite center island. Next to the Kitchen, the elegant Formal Dining Room features beautiful Victorian windows and a Cozy Family Area, perfect for enjoying games and quality time together after dinner. Ascend the modern Floating Staircase to the luxurious Master Suite on the second floor, here a double French Door leads to a spacious outdoor Balcony boasting breathtaking hillside views. The Master Retreat features a generous walk-in closet, custom-built wall cabinets, Soaking Tub, Steam Room with rain shower, and a Private Lavatory. Additional 3 spacious Bedrooms and 2 stylish Bathrooms complete the upper floor. The expansive backyard is a true entertainer's paradise, complete with a Pickleball & Tennis Court, a Sparkling Pool, a separate Heated Spa, and outdoor Pool Bathroom. An additional 820 SF 1 Bed/1 Bath Guest House, plus, a BONUS 1, 720 SF 2story Storage House provide endless possibilities for hobbies and expansion. Additional notable features include: 2 zoned AC units, brand-new fully paid-off Solar & Back-up Battery System, a Hidden Office Room, wired sound system, and much more. Ideally steps away from Lemon & Royal Oaks walking & biking trails. Experience the best of the many exclusive delights that Bradbury offers!

Now, $300k less and Tree Trimming is done The 4 br (2 Suites w their own thermostats) + a sewing/office/game room, 3.5 ba, and a total of 4, 382 sf One-Level home was completely rebuilt and custom redesigned with most all interior walls removed in 2001. Horses allowed. It's like country living., yet close to the conveniences such as Von's, Aldi, Target, Walmart, Home Depot, TJ Maxx, and minutes from Trader's Joe and Restaurants' Row

This stunning estate is located in the exclusive 24 hour guard gated community of Bradbury Estates . The main Kitchen features 10 gas burners & one extra large burner on the large center island + 2 Sub-Zero refrigerators, 2 dishwashers & trash compactors. The quiet peaceful grounds feature a tennis court, infinity edge pool and palatial manicured gardens. 8 car garage spaces. Must see to believe!

Nestled amongst the coveted gated Bradbury Estates, this sophisticated manor situated on almost 2.5 acres exudes refined opulence and regal grandeur. With 6 bedrooms and 9 bathrooms, and over 8, 300 square feet, 430 Long Canyon offers an abundance of indoor and outdoor living space ideal for entertaining friends and family and hosting guests. As you enter the second gate onto the property and pull up the grand drive, the home embodies a stately ambience with the statement fountain and expansive motor court. Upon entry into the grand foyer, the double vaulted ceilings and detailed wainscoting instantly captivate. The ornate chandelier overhead casts a warm inviting glow, illuminating the intricate craftsmanship. Seamlessly flowing into the formal living space large double-height windows frame the picturesque views of the meticulously landscaped grounds. At the rear of the home, discover the open concept flow between the gourmet kitchen, breakfast nook and family room allowing for a seamless and inviting space for both everyday living and entertaining guests. The abundant natural light and thoughtfully designed layout create a warm and welcoming atmosphere, making it the heart of the home. With direct access to the backyard space through the numerous sets of French doors, the property merges indoor and outdoor living seamlessly offering the ability to connect the spaces in a unified and accessible manner. The second level features the primary suite alongside 4 additional bedrooms all with respective en-suites. The primary suite paired with the luxe primary bath offers a tranquil ambiance ideal for rest and relaxation. Complete with a double-sided fireplace, outdoor balcony, wet bar, and spa-like amenities, peacefully unwind in this private oasis. Resting upon its sprawling grounds, the outdoor area enhances the sense of grandeur. Explore the flawlessly manicured lawn, an enchanting rose garden, a pristine pool and spa, multiple inviting seating areas, a picturesque outdoor pergola and a regal guest house.

Great opportunity to live in a single level custom built home located on top of the world with panoramic unobstructed city light and mountain views. Location, Location, Location... Lose yourself in the serenity of this Bradbury hillside home. The drive up the winding road away from the noises and traffic from the city below takes you into nature in a matter of minutes. Listen and enjoy the quiet and secluded location at the top of the hill revealing unmatched 180 degree views with captivating sunsets. Nestled in the prestigious and exclusive enclave of Bradbury, this stunning single-story residence offers a rare opportunity to live amidst unparalleled luxury. This home is a perfect blend with nature.

Find yourself home at 2115 Gardi Street in the City of Bradbury where you will discover a tastefully updated home attractively set above street level on a sprawling 20, 084 sqft lot, and ideally positioned near the end of a quiet cul-de-sac revealing a scenic hillside backdrop by day and the flicker of city lights by night. This home will impress with a sought-after, sun-filled floorplan of four bedrooms and three baths proportioned nicely within the 2, 292 square feet of living space and showcases effortless flow between the large common rooms and the convenience of having the bedrooms separated nicely for quiet retreat. The well-sized living room features picture windows, a central fireplace and hearth, flow to the covered patio and smooth passage into the adjacent great-room where family and friends will gather comfortably for added entertaining area and maximum flexibility. The home features an updated kitchen/dining/family space with loads of extra storage in an adjacent pantry large enough for a built-in desk for the most organized home cooks and work-from-home convenience. A generously sized primary suite is found at the end of the hall offering maximum privacy, natural light from the south-facing windows, a walk-in closet and dressing area and a large updated full bath with double sink vanity, separate shower and spa tub. The three remaining bedrooms are all nicely sized and share a three-quarter bath. Enjoy the small-town benefits and quiet surroundings of Bradbury, in addition to the close proximity to the popular Duarte Bike & Walking Trail as well as the beauty of the equine trails and properties. Close to the award-wining CSArts/San Gabriel Valley campus as well as the Duarte Unified STEAM Academy. This peaceful location will welcome you home each and every day while gifting residents ease of access to the 605 and 210 freeways, closeness to the City of Hope, Pasadena and the many foothill communities.

Situated in the foothills of the San Gabriel mountains, this Bradbury estate is an entertainers dream. Let the soaring ceilings & hardwood floors take your breath away as you enter through the double doors. Incredible, one-story, custom-built modern estate located in the prestigious gated Woodlynn Lane Community! Located in the exclusive 24-hour guard gated Bradbury Estates, this rustic Monterey Colonial estate is ready for a complete remodel to make it one of Bradbury's finest.
